item.description:
Summer Greetings!  

 

I am so looking forward to being in community with all of you again!  Please join us this coming Saturday, July 9th from 6 pm - 8 pm in our usual space in Watertown Square. 

 

A Tantra Gathering is a sacred space for us to connect with ourselves and each other.  There will be opportunities to breathe and get back into your body; to chant and re-harmonize your chakras; to practice Tantra Yoga and open up spaces and places in your body that are holding you back, keeping you small and not allowing you to experience ALL THERE IS to experience.  

 

Please bring a loving, juicy, sexy, sensuous, sacred poem to share (if you feel called to.) 

 

With great love and affection!

Pushana 

 

p.s.  Please pay in advance to receive the EARLY BIRD price of $20.  Using PayPal, you can send money to my email address:  pushana@gmail.com.  The cost will be $30 at the door.
item.name: Summer Tantra Gathering
